content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich, let me begin discussing the rental price for this exceptional property. Initially, I had considered a higher figure, but given our brief exchange today, I am inclined to lower my expectations slightly. How about we start negotiations at 1,350 Euros per month? Remember, if you find this acceptable, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' should you choose this amount or any revised figure, reaching an agreement. TERMINATE if discussions are no longer fruitful for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
